tips.title: Sesizoqala
tips.subTitle: Qala ukwenza amapojekthi kuScratch ngokuzama i online tutorial noma downiloda i PDF Guide.
tips.tttBody: Yini ofuna ukuyenza ngo Scratch? Kumsebenzi ngamunye, ungazama Izifundo , downloda izinhlelo Amakhadi okusebenza noma ubuke i Educator Guide.
tips.cardsBody: Ngamakhadi ukusebenzisa aScratch, ungafunda ukwenza imidlalo , yezindaba , nomculo ,opopayi  nokunye
tips.starterProjectsBody: Ungadlala ngeprojekthi yabaqalayo ukuze uthole umqondo wokwenza ikwakho.
tips.offlineEditorBody: Ukwenza iprojekthi ngaphandle kwe inthanethi unga downloda kumhleli wa offline.
tips.questionsBody: Uma unemibuzo ? buka iimibuzo ejwayele ukubuzwanoma uvakasheleukubuza ngeforum yeScript yemibhalo.
ttt.tutorialSubtitle: Thola ukuthi  iyenziwa kanjani iprojekthi izifundo zikaScratch eziza ngokulandelana
ttt.activitySubtitle: Funda izindlela ezintsha zokukhoda usebenzisa amakhadi achazayo ongawaprinta.
ttt.educatorSubtitle: Sebenzisa lenkombandlela kathisha ukuhlela okuhola amaWorkshop aScratch ehora elilodwa
ttt.MakeItFlyDescription: Nyakazisa ikati lika Scratch, amantombazane ePowerpuff Girls, noma ngisho ithakho.
ttt.AnimateYourNameDescription: Nyakazisa izinhlamvu zesibongo sakho, siqalo samagama noma igama olithandayo
ttt.RaceDescription: Yenza umdlalo lapho abalingiswa ababili begijimisana
ttt.MakeMusicDescription: Khetha ithuluzi, faka umsindo bese ucindezela izikinobho ukudlala umsindo
ttt.HideAndSeekDescription: Yenza umdlalo wokucasha noma ufune onabalingisi abavela babuye banyamalale
ttt.StoryDescription: Khetha abalingisi, faka ingxoxo, bese wenza indaba yakho iphile
ttt.FashionDescription: Yenza umdlalo lapho ugqokisa umlingisi izingubo ezahlukene nezitayela ezahlukeke
ttt.PongDescription: Yenza umdlalo webhola elibhambayo elinomsindo, amaphuzu kanye neminye imithelela
ttt.DanceDescription: Qamba inkundla yomdanso wopopayi unomcula kanye kanye neminyakazo yokudansa
ttt.CatchDescription: Yenza umdlalo lapho ungabamba khona izinto eziwa zivela esibhakabhakeni
ttt.VirtualPetDescription: Yenza isilwane esifuyiwe sidle, siphuze futhi sidlale
